body.p: I have recently seen Maj. Johnson the Paymaster of Vancleaves Division, he says he will pay that division off the last week & this or the first week in next month. the 9th & 21st Ky. belong to that division, I know some in the 21st who now have money and have had for sometime which they wish to send home. Should you Conclude to send me down there, prepare the bond so that it can be executed before the Circuit Court Clerk, send me the necessary instructions &c I think it prudent that this arrangemt be kept private, Send the papers by the bearer of this under seal to me, I suppose I should have a commission, so that I may be enabled to get a pass at Nashville to pass to the Army --

Glasgow
W. F. Evans
Application Agent for Soldiers
recd & ansd 12th Oct/63
Commissioned 26th Oct/63
